values: To minimize means to reduce something to the lowest possible level.
I checked my homework twice to minimize errors I might have made.
vt.使减到最少
v. to make as small as possible 将...减到最低程度
v. to treat or describe as smaller or less important than it is 贬低
vt. 使减到最少；小看，极度轻视
vi. 最小化
时态:minimized, minimizing, minimizes名 词:minimization
名 词:minimizer
